title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 89.3 - Permitted investments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 89.3 - Permitted investments

State Regulations
A thrift institution may invest in, purchase or otherwise
acquire any qualified equity security or any qualified debt security in
accordance with the provisions of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
89.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
